item.title: Contribute with a Dnister Community Saver Account
item.description:
Thanks to a new initiative from the Dnister Ukrainian Credit Co-operative, you can make contributions to nominated community organisations, plus earn interest on your own savings, thanks to a Community Saver Account.
**How does it work? ** You create a Community Saver Account to use, and as according to Dnister's website: Not only will it provide you with a high interest savings account, Dnister will also annually contribute an additional 1.
